phrs.translation: 布兰登·劳斯, 布兰登·罗斯, 班顿洛夫, 主演布兰登·罗斯
劳斯方程, 劳思方程, Routh方程
劳斯, 劳思, 罗斯, 鲁斯

sentences.sentence: Routh criterion", The Routh criterion can be used on low order systems ."
sentences.translation: 罗斯准则可使用在低阶系统上。

sentences.sentence: "You will find it a very good practice always to verify your references, Sir" (Martin Joseph Routh).
sentences.translation: “先生，你会发现经常核对你的参考材料是一个很有益的习惯”(马丁·约瑟夫·劳斯)。

sentences.sentence: An example shows that the result by the perturbation bounds method is superior to that of the Routh Criterion.
sentences.translation: 实例计算表明，单向摄动界法较劳斯判据法更为快速、精确。
